"Halt, do not shoot. I am not an enemy.": "I am Hadi, an ARKS stationed at Retem City."
"That is the name of the city here in this region, is it not?"
"I was going to step in, but your fight was quite the spectacle."
"I couldn't help but watch in amazement. Forgive my tardiness."
"You hear that? That means we're totally getting stronger!"
"We're on our way to Retem City right now, actually."
"Would you be able to tell us how to get there?"
"If you head south from here you'll reach an oasis. The city is just beyond it."
"I would take you myself, but I'm on reconnaissance duty at the moment."
"I hope we can meet again some time... Take care."
